title: FrontEnd Developer  ReactJS
description:
SUN Education Group is now hiring FrontEnd Developer ReactJS in Jakarta. View
job listing details and apply now. Design develop and build highly scalable
cross-platform and high-performance web applications using ReactJS Apply design
patterns and design principles to produce maintainable and easy to extend code
Work with Product Management to validate product requirements assess and
estimate effort required NotionTrello etc Collaborate with feature team to
develop storiessprints and tasks Experienced in AgileScrum development is an
advantage Experienced in slicing UIUX design to responsive web application with
self styling code and API integration is an advantage Excellent skills in
ReactJS and Typescript with structured state and lifecycle Good knowledge of
REACT tools including ReactJS Webpack Sagas Redux Recoil Flux etc Strong
understanding of user-friendly experience amp interface pay attention to details
and proficiency in HTML5 and CSS3 GitHub amp GitLab branching Full WfO at Meruya
Jakarta Barat
